
取交集
=IF(COUNTIF(B:B,A1)>0,A1,"")




=INDEX(C:C,SMALL(IF(MATCH(C$1:C$4,A:A,)=ROW($1:$4),ROW($1:$4),99),ROW(C1)))&""




=INDEX(C:C,SMALL(IF(MATCH(C:C,A:A,)=ROW(C),ROW(C),99),ROW(C1)))&""


=INDEX(C:C,MATCH(,COUNTIF(D$1:D1,C:C),))&""








=INDEX(D:D,MATCH(,COUNTIF(F$1:F3,D$1:D$21),))&""




=INDEX(D:D,MATCH(,COUNTIF(F$1:F1,D$1:D$21),))&""





=INDEX(D:D,MATCH(,COUNTIF(F$1:F1,D$1:D$21),))&""





=INDEX(I:I,MATCH(,COUNTIF(J$1:J1,I$1:I$1000),))&""


=INDEX(C:C,MATCH(,COUNTIF(D$1:D1,C$1:C$1000),))&""
